TransFabriC24.title: Institute for circular transfabrication (TranFabriC)
TransFabriC24.comment: Institut de la transfabrication circulaire embodies the ambition of the Conservatoire national des Arts et Métiers to support the development of social and civic practices for the emergence of a social, solidarity-based and circular economy (ESSC). The aim is to create an operating eco-system, training courses and a research program, together capable of bringing about the emergence of an ESSC in line with the Cnam's historic missions.
TransFabriC24.place: Conservatoire national des Arts et Métiers (CNAM), France

LaboCouleurs.title: Laboratory of colours at École Duperré/Cnam
LaboCouleurs.comment: The aim of the Laboratory of colours is to listen to the questions posed by the fashion industry and to try, through different areas of experimentation and media coverage, to study and develop dyeing, particularly natural dyeing, and to provide appropriate answers.
LaboCouleurs.place: Conservatoire national des Arts et Métiers (CNAM), France

IFMdoc.title: Setting up resarch activities related to the evolution of the fashion industry
IFMdoc.comment: Based at the Institut Français de la Mode (IFM) and in association with the Cnam, this new program will bring together the worlds of fashion innovation and technology, the social sciences and the arts in a single doctoral program. It will be interdisciplinary in nature, combining theoretical investigations, practical experience and applied research, with a view to the future.
IFMdoc.place: Conservatoire national des Arts et Métiers (CNAM), France

Cagami.title: Cagami project
Cagami.comment: The aim of the Cagami project is to find concrete solutions to this problem by capturing gestures from the arts, fashion and industry in 3 dimensions, using three technologies: 360-degree video, motion capture and volumetric capture.
Cagami.place: Conservatoire national des Arts et Métiers (CNAM), France

Fablab23.title: Creation of a shared fablab
Fablab23.comment: Fablab shared by the Chair of Design Jean Prouvé and the Cnam's shared workshop, funded by a non-earmarked teaching grant.
Fablab23.place: Conservatoire national des Arts et Métiers (CNAM), France

Rijkswaterstaat20.title: Rijkswaterstaat expedition 2050
Rijkswaterstaat20.comment: Échafauder une imagination partagée par le biais du design pour faciliter les discussions avec un échantillon représentatif de la population néerlandaise sur l'avenir des Pays-Bas
Rijkswaterstaat20.place: Eindhoven University of Technologie (TU/e), the Netherlands

VASE19.place: Eindhoven University of Technologie (TU/e), the Netherlands
